name: Adriahni - Monster from a dream.
description:
I had a dream last night, and in it I was reading a bestiary from an unknown game...  and in that book were the Adriahni.  Truly, a monster pulled from a dream.

The Adriahni are scavengers and parasites, they feed on carrion when in their adult form...  but when the infest a tree and form a colony... watch out.

In the pdf there is advice for including them into any game system, from stat suggestions to tactics.  Enjoy.
